snippet.title: Seasons after Fall - Gamescom 2014 Trailer
snippet.description:
Seasons after Fall is an exploration game, still in development.
The game is meant to be released in 2015.

More info about Seasons after Fall on
http://www.swingswingsubmarine.com

- - - - - - -

Can we say that there are only four seasons when the world around us is constantly changing?

Play as a wild fox, traveling across the countryside, through lush forests and quiet rivers, and using the surprising power to control the seasons at will. You will meet some strange creatures on the way, including the Spirits of Seasons, whose changing tempers could alter the course of your journey.
